column5: I know that you cannot take potatos into Canada but can a person take in a sack of onions? Been trying to find the answer but have not found the answer yet. Thanks

[font color=green size=3][b]Here's a link, with a phone number: http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/E/pub/cp/...html#P141_4348 I was told no once, because of soil that might be on the onions, that might carry disease. But my wife has been hauling them up without a problem. It depends on the day and custom agent I guess.
